name: Touhou: Sumireko's Clearance Cruise
description:
Help Sumireko and Nitori obtain the largest horde of post-Valentine’s discount chocolates ever seen before the supermarket closes, which somehow translates into a match-3 puzzler scorefest scramble! Somehow!

Features:

  • High-speed combination lock match-3 puzzling – easy to learn, hard to master!
  • Fantastic artwork by DJThunderheart!
  • A seven-song soundtrack mostly inspired by Knuckles’ Chaotix and the Sega Genesis, complete with secret unlockable songs!
  • One (1) cutscene!
  • Discussion of aromanticism and asexuality!
  • A song for a character who isn’t even in the game that I plugged out in a few hours because I was fixating on said character for a few days!
  • High scores to beat!
  • Aesthetic trappings of the 90s!
  • Secrets?????

Controls:

  • Select a chocolate with Left Click, and deselect it with Right Click or Space.
  • Use the arrow keys (in left-handed mode) or WASD (in right-handed mode) to shift the selected chocolate’s row and column.
  • Match at least three chocolates in a line to remove them! The bigger the match, the more points and time you earn! Prioritize big initial matches over large combos!
  • During the cutscene, press Z to advance a page, and X to skip to the end of a line.
